title: All Hail The Power Of Jesus

sections.title: Verse 1
content: All hail the power of Jesus' name!
And crown Him Lord of all!

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Ye chosen seed of Israel's race,
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
And crown Him Lord of all!

sections.title: Chorus
content: And crown Him Lord of all!
